string.value: Rolonay has been deeply immersed in the study of transformation across space and time. I wonder if there's anything I can do to help in his research.

Rolonay thinks that he'll have to rely on some openings between Papulatus' dimensions to transform through space and time. But that won't be as easy as long as Papulatus is around! Rolonay suggests defeating Papulatus to find a clue that might lead to finding the openings between dimensions. I should defeat #rPapulatus#k and look for #bany strange or special objects#k to help Rolonay with his research.
When I defeated Papulatus, I received a strange key. I gave the key to Rolonay, thinking that it might actually be a crucial piece of clue.
안녕하세요~? 오랜만이에요. 예전보다 살이 빠진 것 같다구요? 휴~ 요새 하고 있는 연구가 힘들어서 말이죠. 시공간을 변형하여 내가 원하는 시간과 장소로 갈 수 있게 하는 방법에 대해 연구하고 있는데 이게 뜻대로 쉽지 않네요.
정말 연구가 성공하면 좋겠죠? 만일 연구가 성공하면 과거로 돌아가 잘못된 점을 바로 잡을 수도 있어요. 연구는 80%정도 성공적으로 진행 중인데... 갑자기 진척이 없네요. 시공간을 변형하기 위해서는 루디브리엄의 차원의 균열을 이용하는 법이 좋은데... 아시다시피 이것은 파풀라투스가 장악하고 있죠
#h0#님이 절 도와주시겠어요? 물론 보답은 후하게 해드리죠.
#h0#님의 용감함이라면 충분히 파풀라투스를 무찌를 수 있을 거에요. #r파풀라투스#k를 무찌르고 혹시 수상한 점이나 단서가 될만한 점이 없는지 찾아봐 주세요.
아직 파풀라투스는 무리이신가요? 제가 직접 파풀라투스를 만나봐야 하나... 무서워...

Hey there! Long time! What? I look like I lost weight? That is true. The studies I have been conducting these days have been brutal to my body. I've been working on this new study where I'm seeking a new method that'll allow you to move from one place to another at an exact time by warping the dimension of time. This is obviously not an easy task...

Don't you think it'll be great if this really pans out? If it does, then we can travel to the past and correct our mistakes. I have actually gone 80% with this study, and it had been going great... until now. I've been stuck on neutral for a while now... in order to warp the dimension of time, I'll need to use the crack of dimension at Ludibrium. Unfortunately, you and I both know that place is controlled by Papulatus.
#h0#, are you really willing to help me with this? Of course, if all goes well, I will reward you well for your work.
With your unparallelled bravery, I think you are more than capable of defeating Papulatus. Defeat #rPapulatus#k, and also take note of anything abnormal that may serve as clues to this study.
Is Papulatus too much for you? Do I have to face him myself? Oh no...
Did you get any clues from Papulatus?
Hmm... it's a key. What is it for?
Please find anything abnormal regarding the crack of dimension through Papulatus.
